definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: A paper's storage characteristics will also affect the longevity of a print.
sentences.chinese: 紙張的保存特性仍然影響印品的保存期。

sentences.english: We think we don’t need to explain how paper and card textures are being used in web designing and give the design a very rough cut-and-paste and unpolished style.
sentences.chinese: 如何在網頁中模仿紙張的質感無需我們贅述了。

sentences.english: Colour crepe paper is a kind of paper of widely used.
sentences.chinese: 彩色縐紋紙是廣泛應用的一個紙張品種。

sentences.english: They manufacture paper supplies, notebooks, and Trapper Keepers, among other things.
sentences.chinese: 他們製造紙張，筆記本，夾子和其他許多文具。

sentences.english: My kite is made of paper.
Can we preserve the printed page and the art and skills of reading?
sentences.chinese: 我們能保護印刷紙張和閱讀的藝術和技巧嗎？

sentences.english: Annisputting the paper into a red bin.
sentences.chinese: 安把紙張放進一個紅色的箱櫃裏。

sentences.english: Relief print quality depends on paper quality.
sentences.chinese: 救濟打印質量取決於紙張質量。

sentences.english: And subscribing to so many print mags is a big waste of paper.
sentences.chinese: 而訂閱這麼多印刷雜誌是一大紙張浪費。

sentences.english: Pay attention how thin the slices are.
sentences.chinese: 請注意這些薄如紙張的白菜切片。

sentences.english: But this is not about page printing.
sentences.chinese: 但這不僅僅是關於紙張打印。

sentences.english: In paper manufacture the lip gap at the headbox determines the thickness of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 造紙工業中，流漿箱的出口邊沿間隙決定紙張的厚度。

sentences.english: This printing machine has a carriage which holds and moves the paper.
sentences.chinese: 這臺印刷機上的滑動板可放紙和移動紙張。

sentences.english: The grain direction must go from head to tail.
sentences.chinese: 紙張的紋理必須垂直地從頭順到尾。

sentences.english: Lift the paper support, and extend the paper exit tray.
sentences.chinese: 打開紙張支架並拉開出紙托盤。

sentences.english: Standard testing conditions for paper are 23 degress C and 50% r. h .
sentences.chinese: 測試紙張的標準環境是攝氏23度，相對溫度50%。

definition: paper/hard copy/printed (as opposed to electronically displayed)
paper money/a bill (e.g. 100 yuan)/CL:張|张[zhang1],紮|扎[za1]
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
